showerReviews.reviewText: Our well pump is broken, so we currently have no water! My husband and I went to JJ's Travel Plaza early in the morning to take a much-needed shower. The woman working there was very friendly and helpful. Although we brought our own towels, ‚Ä¶

Location good, truck parking good. Store has everything you need and looks clean. They do not clean the showers between use. There was piss all on the seat of the toilet in the shower I paid for. I told the manager and she just said ok and ‚Ä¶
great places to stop and rest for truckers the parking lot is very spacious and comfortable.There is also shower  a cat scale

Best shower rooms ever! After being out of State for a week, I came home to a house of broken water lines. This place is just down the highway from me and I wanted to relax. Unlimited time, powerful massaging shower (adjustable settings), ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewerName: Mi cha EL Cal dw EL l
showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ , but tight. You might have to wait for a stall first thing in the morning. Other than that you have McDonalds or Subway... McDonalds is open 24 hrs.  I did not get a chance to shower but they do have 3. Stay safe on those roads my friends!
showerReviews.uniqueId: Mi cha EL Cal dw EL l_‚Ä¶_,_but_tight._You_might_have_to_wait_for_a_stall__5 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Best shower. $5. Clean. Awesome. One cashier has an attitude but it‚Äôs worth it for the water pressure. The other employees are friendly and helpful.
I was VERY impressed with the restrooms here. They were clean and odor free. I had to use a shower room since the women's restroom was closed for cleaning and even the showers were spotless.
Even the fast food is good here. Clean, $5 shower and they provide towels. Nice, quite, clean, paved, truck parking.
A clean and safe place to stop during your travels, day or night. You can even take a shower and wash and dry clothes here. What more could you ask for?
Friendly people who work here , clean shower, reasonably priced.

showerReviews.reviewText: Easy to get in and out of. though it's limited in tractor trailer parking it's well lit up and open. They don't have many showers but the showers are clean and the one I was in was huge. Like five people could have showered at the same time ‚Ä¶
This Pilot gas/convenience store is a great place to stop when traveling US31. Clean restrooms and has fresh coffee that tastes great. Has really friendly staff.

It's new and clean, what's not to like about that?  Has a Dunkin Donuts and a PJ Fresh Market.  Pretty convenient access off US 31.  Not very crowded at all on a nice Sunday afternoon. Just stopped for a quick coffee.  Didn't even know the place was here til I saw it.

Nice pilot, very clean lot, clean showers with good water pressure, they got a regular Dunkin‚Äô inside and a pj fresh, truck normally fills up by 6:30 pm. There is Starbucks, a wing place and Walmart across the street. Update after coming to ‚Ä¶
Good clean place to gas up and use the restroom

locations.title: Heartland Truck Stop & Wash
locations.content: Heartland Truck Stop & Wash may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: When you pull into the entrance on the gravel lot in front of their washout bays, walk over to the dark grey building and go inside to pay for your washout. (Inside is a convenience store) Once you pay for your washout, one of the numbered washout bays will open up for you.

Great place I came for the washout after my delivery at Bhj , got a free shower as a result! Didn‚Äôt get to try the restaurant but, I did grab a couple blts from the fridge and I have to say they were pretty amazing with some of the best lettuce and tomato I‚Äôve ever had. Very solid place I enjoyed it and I‚Äôll be back for sure.

A nice little spot where you can sit down and eat and maybe grab a shower if you're waiting for your load at the tyson plant down the road. They have a truck wash attached next door and they also sell diesel just in case you're running low, ‚Ä¶

Be sure to go in the cafe and get excellent food
Had reefer washed out and done a great job
I had their special filly steak n peppers sandwich w/fries and My Oh My Goodness delicious! Will be back soon Thank you
The truck washout is great and runs smoothly. The fuel is reasonably priced.  The cashiers are polite. The restaurant needs to stay open past 2pm.

‚Ä¶ don't get cleaned . A guy came and made the coffee with no problem he got a nice tip. Then I decided to take a shower waited over an hour for a shower and then had to clean it myself even tho I do do that anyway but she said she doesn't ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ 3. We got a handicap shower by chance, as a team and that was everything ‚Ä¶

You really should have a talk with your friends running the Wendy‚Äôs here. I stopped for dinner a shower and to get some things for the road. Leaving with no dinner and have to keep traveling to find something to eat elsewhere. When you ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ever been in. Just about anything you could need on the road. They have shower stalls for truck drivers as well that can be rented. The bathroom could use some work, but it's better than average for most gas stations. Cold and hot food ‚Ä¶

I came in at 6:30 this morning for a shower and was helped by the kindest Employee I have encountered in a very long time. I didn't catch her name but she had blonde hair in a pony tail. I have a substantial arm injury and she offered me an ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ The upsides include reasonable snack selection and a shower for truckers.   Its condition remains a mystery to me.

‚Ä¶ , but why do you let trucks park where they are not sopose to, hard to get in and out, and the Ontario canada drivers are always parked in the fuel island sleeping, taking a shower, or taking a break, I have seen this at several locations?
Dirty shower unbelievable how this places don't hire a cualified supervisor they charge $18 for this
Why do employees feel it's ok to "let the showers fill up before we clean anymore "? That IS NOT ok!! We, as truck drivers, don't get paid by the hour!!! üò° ‚Ä¶

The Loves at this location is decent. The showers are kinda clean. The toilet in the shower needed to be cleaned better. The McDonald's at this location is an absolute DUMP! It is filthy and they seem to screw up the orders a lot. The staff ‚Ä¶

Do better cleaning the showera for truck drivers. I know it not the Hilton but you could atleast vacuum all the fans in those shower area and power wash the walls ( dirty grout or moldy) and wipe off ledges and lights with dust on them

‚Ä¶ nice young guys after that I went to take shower but the  short lady I think she is Latinos I ask her shower then she told me my reward doesn‚Äôt have shower I ask her I just expended $198.69 at least I have points plus a week ago I took fuel ‚Ä¶

Not very different from the other Love's stores, this one is also a clean and well stored place with excellent staff working diligently to keep the air fresh. Showers are well kempt and equipped with motion sensor lights. So don't panic. Ev ‚Ä¶

A great place to get awesome coffee food and a fresh clean shower sincerely head of maintenance

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ entertainment. There‚Äôs a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn‚Äôt get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There‚Äôs also ‚Ä¶

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. ‚Ä¶

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized ‚Ä¶

World‚Äôs biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. ‚Ä¶

As you need 75 gallons of diesel for free shower, i was able to make only 52  gallons..my tanks already got full...there was no shower on my Ambest card. Counter girl Jasica gave me favor and only charged me .75 cents instead of $ 10 for ‚Ä¶

The bidet was a surprise. Never seen one of these in a truck stop shower room. Looks like the place was in the process of being remodel. They do have a Arby's and other convenience store items. There is a repair shop for trucks also. The ‚Ä¶

Shower was COLD. Cashiers told me my fleet card was ok,  then changed their mind. Then charged me credit price after telling me debit card was good for cash price. Overall one of the worst Ambest places I've ever been to.
